name: ABMutableMultiValue
desc: A mutable representation of a property that might have multiple values.

items.name: func add(Any!, withLabel: String!) -> String!
items.desc: Adds a value and its label to a multivalue list.

items.name: func insert(Any!, withLabel: String!, at: Int) -> String!
items.desc: Inserts a value and its label at the given index in a multivalue list.

items.name: func replaceLabel(at: Int, withLabel: String!) -> Bool
items.desc: Replaces the label at the given index.

items.name: func replace(at: Int, withValue: Any!) -> Bool
items.desc: Replaces the value at the given index.

items.name: func removeAndLabel(at: Int) -> Bool
items.desc: Removes the value and label at the given index.

items.name: func setPrimaryIdentifier(String!) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets the primary value to be the value for the given identifier.
